article_title: Health Net Announces Successful Completion of its Consent Solicitation with Respect to its 6.375% Senior Notes due 2017

article_metadata.description: Health Net Announces Successful Completion of its Consent Solicitation with Respect to its 6.375% Senior Notes due 2017

twitter.title: Health Net Announces Successful Completion of its Consent Solicitation with Respect to its 6.375% Senior Notes due 2017
twitter.description: Health Net Announces Successful Completion of its Consent Solicitation with Respect to its 6.375% Senior Notes due 2017

article_summary:
Health Net also offers behavioral health, substance abuse and employee assistance programs, and managed health care products related to prescription drugs.
LOS ANGELES--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Health Net, Inc. (NYSE:HNT) (“Health Net”) announced today that it has received the consents necessary to effect certain amendments (the “Amendments”) to its 6.375% Senior Notes due 2017 (CUSIP No.
St. Louis, MO 63105, (314) 725-4477 or from Centene’s website, http://www.centene.com/investors/, or from Health Net upon written request to the Investor Relations Department, Health Net, Inc. 21650 Oxnard Street Woodland Hills, CA 91367, (800) 291-6911, or from Health Net’s website, www.healthnet.com/InvestorRelations.
Health Net conducted the consent solicitation at the request of Centene pursuant to a covenant contained in the Merger Agreement.
For more information on Health Net, Inc., please visit Health Net’s website at www.healthnet.com.
